meanings.definition: A device used for counting blood cells.
meanings.sent1: The hemacytometers helped the scientist count the blood cells accurately.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician used hemacytometers to measure the number of blood cells in the sample.
meanings.sent3: The hemacytometers decided to go on strike, tired of counting blood cells all day.
meanings.sent4: The hemacytometers were like diligent little workers, tirelessly tallying the blood cells.
meanings.sent5: With the hemacytometers in hand, the researcher could easily track the blood cell count.

meanings.sent1: In the lab, there were multiple hemacytometers used for different experiments.
meanings.sent2: The scientists compared the results from two hemacytometers to ensure accuracy.
meanings.sent3: The hemacytometers gathered for a group photo, proud to be the plural form of hemacytometer.
meanings.sent4: The shelves were filled with hemacytometers, each waiting to be put to good use.
meanings.sent5: The hemacytometers lined up neatly, ready to assist in various blood cell counts.
